issuetype.name: Bug

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: TestTokenClientRMService and TestRMDelegationTokens are faking kerberos authentication.  The remote user ugis are explicitly created as kerberos but not the login user's ugi.  Prior to  HADOOP-9747 new ugi instances defaulted to kerberos even if not kerberos.  Now ugis default to kerberos only if actually kerberos based which causes the login user based tests to fail.
fields.summary: Fix tests faking kerberos to explicitly set ugi auth type

Note this patch contains no functional change outside of the two test files it updated.
